_comment: agent-bom MCP Server Registry — threat intelligence database for known MCP servers
_differentiator: Threat intelligence database — not just a catalog. Each entry has risk_level, tools, credential_env_vars for blast radius pre-computation.

@modelcontextprotocol/server-filesystem.description: Read and write local filesystem files

@modelcontextprotocol/server-gdrive.description: Browse and read Google Drive files

@modelcontextprotocol/server-everything.description: Demo server with all MCP primitives

@cloudflare/mcp-server-cloudflare.description: Manage Cloudflare Workers, KV, R2, DNS

mcp-server-qdrant.description: Qdrant vector database search and storage

@supabase/mcp-server-supabase.description: Read/write Supabase tables, storage, Edge Functions

@notionhq/notion-mcp-server.description: Read and write Notion pages, databases, blocks
